AhkNekoHelp.CodeLens.showClassReference: show Reference at Class def line
AhkNekoHelp.CodeLens.showFuncReference: show Reference at function def line
AhkNekoHelp.CodeLens.showLabelReference: show Reference at `label:` def line (just support file top label)
AhkNekoHelp.CodeLens.showDevTool: show Func and Method dev tools
AhkNekoHelp.CodeLens.showGlobalVarRefere: global var def using like `global var1 :=`, display the number of references
AhkNekoHelp.Diag.AMasterSwitch-2: (default) if open [workspace](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/workspaces) then diagnose, else not.
AhkNekoHelp.Diag.code107LegacyAssignment: (code107) Diagnostic [`var = value`(legacy assignment)](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/lib/SetEnv.htm) and suggest "try to use `:=` replace `=`"
AhkNekoHelp.Diag.code300FuncSize: (code300) lint of function/Method size (just calc non-blank lines)
AhkNekoHelp.Diag.code500: ([code500](https://github.com/CoffeeChaton/vscode-autohotkey-NekoHelp/blob/main/note/code500.md)) var is assigned but never used, a file max warn number. use ```0``` to close warn.
AhkNekoHelp.Diag.code502: (code502) case sensitivity check of variable, a file max warn number. use ```0``` to close warn.
AhkNekoHelp.Diag.code503: (code503) case sensitivity check of parameter, a file max checks number. use ```0``` to close warn.
AhkNekoHelp.Diag.code508: (code508) diag `global var` is assigned but never used a file max checks number. use ```0``` to close info.
AhkNekoHelp.Diag.code511: (code511) ban var/param name same function-name. use ```0``` to close info.
AhkNekoHelp.Diag.code512: (code512) ban global-var-name same function-name. use ```0``` to close info.
AhkNekoHelp.Diag.code521: use *warn* to avoid confusing names. ([Read More #28](https://github.com/CoffeeChaton/vscode-autohotkey-NekoHelp/issues/28))
AhkNekoHelp.Diag.code522: use *info* to avoid confusing names. ([Read More #28](https://github.com/CoffeeChaton/vscode-autohotkey-NekoHelp/issues/28))
AhkNekoHelp.Diag.code800Deprecated: (code8xx) Diagnostic Deprecated commands, false to hide diag code like [8xx](https://github.com/CoffeeChaton/vscode-autohotkey-NekoHelp/blob/main/src/diag.ts#L206)
AhkNekoHelp.Diag.useModuleValDiag: beta test: try to Diag [5xx](https://github.com/CoffeeChaton/vscode-autohotkey-NekoHelp/blob/main/src/diag.ts#L29) at all file
AhkNekoHelp.format.AMasterSwitchUseForma: if you want to use other format tools or manual processing, close this.
AhkNekoHelp.format.textReplace: `Alpha test options`, It is **not recommended** to turn on except for advanced users.
AhkNekoHelp.format.removeFirstCommaComma: (beta-test)([Preview](https://github.com/CoffeeChaton/vscode-autohotkey-NekoHelp/blob/main/note/config/format.removeFirstCommaCommand.md)) add/remove the first comma after Command
try `Sleep 1000` -> `Sleep, 1000` ; (add first optional comma after command)
try `Sleep, 1000` -> `Sleep 1000` ; (Remove first optional comma after command)
AhkNekoHelp.format.useTopLabelIndent: Indent the `label`, `HotString`, and `HotKey` at the top of the document
AhkNekoHelp.format.useParenthesesIndent: Indent the with `(` and `)` not close
AhkNekoHelp.format.useSquareBracketsInde: Indent the wih `[` and `]` not close
AhkNekoHelp.snippets.CommandOption-1: Don't filter Command, Provides all entered commands.
AhkNekoHelp.snippets.CommandOption-2: filter not recommended Command. (Referral rules from AhkNekoHelp.)
AhkNekoHelp.snippets.CommandOption-3: filter Command with the pack has same name function and not recommended Command
AhkNekoHelp.snippets.exclude:
([ReadMore](https://github.com/CoffeeChaton/vscode-autohotkey-NekoHelp/blob/main/note/config/files.exclude.md)) Disable IntelliSense when the file path contains a match of any of the provided **Array of [RegExp](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/RegExp/RegExp)**. 

Note: pathname separator use ```"/"``` **not windows-default-style** ```"\"```
AhkNekoHelp.snippets.fromOtherFile-2: completion from other files, but the `function_name` `class_name` should startWith filename
AhkNekoHelp.snippets.subCmdPlus: Provide a snip containing sub-command of `Menu` / `Gui` / `GuiControl` / `SysGet` ([Preview](https://github.com/CoffeeChaton/vscode-autohotkey-NekoHelp/blob/main/note/config/snippets.subCmdPlus.md))
AhkNekoHelp.snippets.autoInsertGlobal: ([#39](https://github.com/CoffeeChaton/vscode-autohotkey-NekoHelp/issues/39)) auto insert `global` keywords of `global-var` in func/method range
AhkNekoHelp.customize.statusBarDisplayCo: color of [status bar](https://code.visualstudio.com/api/extension-capabilities/extending-workbench), use HTML Color, exp: ```#e783e1``` or ```rgb(255,255,100)```
AhkNekoHelp.customize.HoverFuncShowRetur: if has `@returns` label, then not show ReturnBlock
AhkNekoHelp.files.exclude:
([ReadMore](https://github.com/CoffeeChaton/vscode-autohotkey-NekoHelp/blob/main/note/config/files.exclude.md)) # Files.exclude 

When building the dataset, we exclude certain folders and files using a list of regular expressions. This list includes patterns for excluding folders like 'temp' and 'history', as well as files like '.ahk2' and '.ahk2'.

- Note that I have standardized the two types of paths that can be used in Windows (common `\` and compatible `/`) to a single Linux-style path `/` that doesn't require JavaScript to escape, and the default regular expression flags are `u` and `i`, [u-flag](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/RegExp/unicode), [i-flag](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/RegExp/ignoreCase).

| regex            | Description                      |
| :--------------- | :------------------------------- |
| `/\.`           | a file/fold name startWith `.`   |
| `/node_modules/` | the path includes `node_modules` |
| `/build/`        | A built-fold in pattern          |
| `/temp/`         | A temp-fold in pattern           |
| `/ahk2/`         | A ahk2-fold in pattern           |
| `\.ah2$`         | file-name end with ah2           |
| `/backup/`       | A backup-fold in pattern         |
| `/history/`      | A history-fold in pattern        |
AhkNekoHelp.files.alwaysIncludeFolder:
([ReadMore](https://github.com/CoffeeChaton/vscode-autohotkey-NekoHelp/issues/21))

In addition to the current workspace, automatically scan the Folder,

For people who are not used to [Multi-root Workspaces](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/editor/multi-root-workspaces)

1. *warn!* this option is allow this extension try to the get file information by `#include` without workspaces. ([privacy-statement](https://github.com/CoffeeChaton/vscode-autohotkey-NekoHelp#privacy-statement))

2. still respect `"AhkNekoHelp.files.exclude"`

| path            | Description                      |
| :--------------- | :------------------------------- |
| `D:/myAutoHotkey/Lib`      | any path        |
AhkNekoHelp.files.tryParserIncludeOpt:
try Parser `#Include` to add `.ahk` data.

1. *warn!* this option is allow this extension try to the get file information by `#include` without workspaces. ([ReadMore](https://github.com/CoffeeChaton/vscode-autohotkey-NekoHelp/blob/main/note/config/files.tryParserIncludeOpt.md))

2. still respect `"AhkNekoHelp.files.exclude"`
AhkNekoHelp.files.tryParserIncludeLog: while `"AhkNekoHelp.files.tryParserIncludeOpt"` open, select to record log.
AhkNekoHelp.signatureHelp.showParamInfo: if has `@param` in ahkDoc, then show or not.([ReadMore](https://github.com/CoffeeChaton/vscode-autohotkey-NekoHelp/blob/main/note/config/signatureHelp.showParamInfo.md))
AhkNekoHelp.signatureHelp.showReturnInfo: if has `@returns` in ahkDoc, then show or not
AhkNekoHelp.signatureHelp.showReturnBloc:
if has `@returns` in ahkDoc, then show it or not.
```ahk
;return block
fn(){
    return something
}
```
if has `@returns` label, then not show ReturnBlock
AhkNekoHelp.signatureHelp.CmdShowParamIn:
exp: 
```ahk
MsgBox , Options, Title, Text, Timeout_Sec
;show info of Options, Title, Text, Timeout_Sec
```
AhkNekoHelp.inlayHints.parameterNamesEna:
([#18](https://github.com/CoffeeChaton/vscode-autohotkey-NekoHelp/issues/18)) Enable/disable inlay hints for parameter names:
```typescript

parseInt(/* str: */ '123', /* radix: */ 8)
 
```
Enable parameter name hints only for literal arguments.
Enable parameter name hints for literal and non-literal arguments.
AhkNekoHelp.inlayHints.parameterNamesSup: ([#18](https://github.com/CoffeeChaton/vscode-autohotkey-NekoHelp/issues/18)) If the value given to a parameter is the same as the parameter name, hide it.
AhkNekoHelp.inlayHints.HideSingleParamet: ([#18](https://github.com/CoffeeChaton/vscode-autohotkey-NekoHelp/issues/18)) Hide inline parameters if a function only has 1 parameter.
AhkNekoHelp.useSymbolProvider: use [outline](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/getstarted/userinterface#_outline-view) and [breadcrumbs](https://code.visualstudio.com/docs/getstarted/userinterface#_breadcrumbs), if you like other plugins SymBolProvider, can close this.
AhkNekoHelp.useColorProvider: use ColorProvider (color-picker) [#50](https://github.com/CoffeeChaton/vscode-autohotkey-NekoHelp/issues/50), if you like other plugins ColorProvider, can close this.
AhkNekoHelp.Rename.functionInStr: if function-name in string like `func("funcName")` , default not replace it to new name [[read more]](https://github.com/CoffeeChaton/vscode-autohotkey-NekoHelp/blob/main/note/config/Rename.functionInStr.md)
AhkNekoHelp.event.FileRenameEvent-3: log and try to Rename `#Include` (`Alpha test options`)
AhkNekoHelp.doc.language:
Language of built-in documentation
The original basis is an [online document](https://www.autohotkey.com/docs/v1/), but in order to have better typesetting in vscode, some changes have been made. If there are any modification requirements/translation errors, please notify me on [github](https://github.com/CoffeeChaton/vscode-autohotkey-NekoHelp).
AhkNekoHelp.doc.language-auto: Automatically select document language (only `en` and `zh-cn` now)
